players.name: Alice
memory: You: "Wow, losing Diana so early is a tough blow. We need to be really cautious today and focus on finding the mafia. Any thoughts on suspicious behavior so far?"
Bob: "I agree with Alice. Let's keep a close eye on each other today and make sure we don't let our guard down. We need to work together as a team to identify any suspicious behavior."
Charlie: "I agree with Bob and Alice that we need to be cautious today. Let's focus on identifying any suspicious behavior and work together as a team."
Charlie: "Let's continue to be vigilant and keep an eye out for any suspicious behavior today. We don't want the mafia to slip through our grasp."
You: "Considering how coordinated and cautious we've been, maybe the mafia is trying too hard to blend in. Let’s think about who might be a little too agreeable."
